src:
Heboh! Netizen Curhat OVO Eror
05 Nov 2019, 06:58 by Achmad Dwi Afriyadi


Foto: ovo

Jakarta - Masyarakat banyak mengeluh lantaran dompet digital OVO mengalami eror. Hal itu terlihat dari maraknya cuitan di media sosial Twitter.Seperti dilihat detikcom, Selasa (5/11/2019) pukul 13.30 ini sudah banyak orang yang mengeluhkan aplikasi OVO tak bisa digunakan. Winda Aulia misalnya dengan akun @WindaAulia2811. "Ada apa dengan ovo???? #OVO #ovoeror #OVO," tulis Winda beberapa menit lalu.Begitu juga dengan Febryan Alam Susatyo dengan akun @febryanalam. Ia mengeluhkan tak bisa log in untuk mengakses OVO."@ovo_id lagi eror ya? ga bisa login ini," tulisnya.Ada juga Kartika Mega yang tidak bisa melakukan pembayaran. Padahal, ia mengaku bisa melakukan top up."Minnn ovo tolongg dong ini eror gini saya keburu mau buat bayar, padahal top up bisa eh malah gabisa buat bayar kayagituuuuu !!1!1," kata Mega dalam akun @kartikamgsr.


OVO Foto: Achmad Dwi Afriyadi


Simak Video "Rudiantara Semringah Sambut OVO Jadi Unicorn Kelima Indonesia"

[Gambas:Video 20detik]

(fdl/fdl)
text:
Gosh! Netizen confide in OVO Error
05 Nov 2019, 06:58 by Achmad Dwi Afriyadi


Photo: ovo

Jakarta - Many people complain because the OVO digital wallet has an error. This can be seen from the rise of tweet on social media Twitter. As seen by AFP on Tuesday (11/5/2019) at 13.30, many people have complained that OVO application cannot be used. Winda Aulia for example with an account @ WindaAulia2811. "What's wrong with ovo ???? #OVO #ovoeror #OVO," wrote Winda a few minutes ago. Likewise with Febryan Alam Susatyo with an @febryanalam account. He complained of not being able to log in to access OVO. "@ Ovo_id is there an error, huh? Can't log in," he wrote. There is also Kartika Mega who can't make payments. In fact, he claimed to be able to top up. "Min, ovo, please help, this error, I want to make a payment, even though the top-up can, uh, it can't even pay like that! 1! 1," Mega said in the @kartikamgsr account.


OVO Photo: Achmad Dwi Afriyadi


Check out the video "Rudiantara Semringah Welcomes OVO to Become Indonesia's Fifth Unicorn"

[Gambas: 20sec video]

(fdl / fdl)
